title: Hextech Chests since the Change to BE
body:
Has anyone actually gotten anything decent out of hextech chests since the BE change went live?

I myself have gotten a bunch of them that are WORSE then level up's with champion shards.

But whenever i have gotten a skin, it's only the really low cost ones.

And not only that, at one point i had enough key's to open 2, and it gave me a skin and a ward skin, and that is it, which i think was also less then what was possible, but unfortunately i think that might have been because i specifically picked to open the 2 at the same time.

The reason i'm asking for everyone else's read on this is because my experience in and of itself doesn't really say much.

replies.body:
Rewards system is now trash, everyone knows it.

I'm just ftp ARAM for the rest of LoL's life (which is getting shorter by the day).

Every level up capsule is trash, every honour capsule is trash, every hextech chest is trash.

Congratulations Tencent, you have successfully killed ~~what~~ _which_ was once the best game in the world.
